sentences.english: Bring security allocation such as kneecap and cuff etc usually, and wear sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 隨身帶上安全配置和護膝護腕等，並穿運動鞋。

sentences.english: His kneepads conceal rocket dart launchers.
sentences.chinese: 他的護膝裏藏有火箭飛鏢發射器。

sentences.english: May I borrow your knee pads and elbow pads?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借用一下你的護膝和護肘嗎？

sentences.english: I strongly recommend to those who want to indulge in this sport that they wear helmets and kneepads .
sentences.chinese: 我強烈建議那些沉浸在這種運動的人要戴頭盔和護膝。

sentences.english: He showed his friends, and for his birthday he got pads and new roller blades!
sentences.chinese: 過生日時，他又得到了一副護膝和一雙新旱冰鞋。

sentences.english: Knee-cap will protect you in sports.
sentences.chinese: 運動時護膝可以保護到你。

sentences.english: Coordinate them with some over knee socks or leg warmers for an extra cute look.
sentences.chinese: 將他們與過膝的襪子或護膝相搭配能看起來更加可愛。

sentences.english: For protection, they WILL wear kneepads.
sentences.chinese: 作爲安全保護，它們都得戴着護膝。

sentences.english: The trousers have double thickness knee panels for extra protection.
sentences.chinese: 這條褲子上有雙倍厚的護膝片以加強保護。
釣魚褲，潛水衣，護膝護腕。

sentences.english: Violent action, can wear knee pads.
sentences.chinese: 猛烈舉動時，可戴上護膝。

definition: fitting one's feet (of shoes or socks)
that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of
weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
